text: basic example functions build datasets create new columns. Metatools can also used run checks

what: Build a dataset from derived — build_from_derived
title: Build a dataset from derived — build_from_derived
text: function builds dataset columns just need pulled . variable derivation format 'dataset.variable' pulled create new dataset. multiple datasets present, joined shared key_seq variables. columns often called 'Predecessors' ADaM, universal optional specify.

title: Build a dataset from derived — build_from_derived
code: build_from_derived(   metacore,   ds_list,   dataset_name = deprecated(),   predecessor_only = TRUE,   keep = FALSE,   verbose = c("message", "warn", "silent") )

title: Build a dataset from derived — build_from_derived
text: metacore metacore object contains specifications dataset interest. ds_list Named list datasets needed build . list unnamed,use names objects. dataset_name Optional string specify dataset built. needed metacore object provided already subsetted. Note: Deprecated version 0.2.0. dataset_name argument removed future release. Please use metacore::select_dataset subset metacore object obtain metadata single dataset. predecessor_only default TRUE, variables origin 'Predecessor' used. FALSE derivation matching dataset.variable used. keep String determine columns original datasets kept "FALSE" (default):  columns also present ADaM specification kept output. "":              original columns carried ADaM, including renamed. e.g. DM.ARM predecessor DM.TRT01P, ARM TRT01P present columns ADaM output. "PREREQUISITE":     columns retained required future derivations specification. Additional prerequisite columns identified columns appear 'derivation' column metacore object format "DATASET.VARIABLE", direct predecessors. Predecessors defined columns derivation 1:1 copy column source dataset. e.g. derivation = "VS.VSTESTCD" predecessor, derivation = "Value VS.VSSTRESN VS.VSTESTCD == 'Heart Rate'" contains VS.VSTESTCD VS.VSSTRESN prerequisites, columns kept ADaM. verbose Character string controlling message verbosity. One : "message" Show warnings messages (default) "warn" Show warnings suppress messages "silent" Suppress warnings messages

title: Check Control Terminology for a Dataset — check_ct_data
text: function checks columns dataset contains control terminology defined metacore specification

title: Check Control Terminology for a Dataset — check_ct_data
code: check_ct_data(data, metacore, na_acceptable = NULL, omit_vars = NULL)

title: Check Control Terminology for a Dataset — check_ct_data
text: data Dataset check metacore metacore object contains specifications dataset interest. variable different codelists different datasets metacore object need subsetted using select_dataset metacore package. na_acceptable logical value character vector, set NULL default. NULL sets acceptability missing values based core variable "Required" metacore object. set TRUE pass check values control terminology missing. set FALSE NA acceptable. set character vector specified variables may contain NA values. omit_vars character vector indicating variables skipped controlled terminology checks. Internally, omit_vars evaluated na_acceptable.

title: Create Variable from Codelist — create_var_from_codelist
text: data Dataset contains input variable metacore metacore object get codelist . subsetted metacore object (subclass DatasetMeta) created using metacore::select_dataset. input_var Name variable translated new column out_var Name output variable. Note: Unless codelist provided grouping always code codelist associates out_var. codelist Optional argument supply codelist. Must data.frame code decode columns created function metacore::get_control_term. codelist provided codelist associated column supplied out_var used. default codelist NULL. decode_to_code Direction translation. Default value TRUE, .e., assumes  input_var decode column codelist. Set FALSE input_var code column codelist. strict logical value indicating whether perform strict checking codelist. TRUE issue warning values input_var column present codelist. FALSE warning issued values present codelist likely result NA results.

title: metatools 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-07-16 Functions now require subsetted metacore object used .e., created via metacore::select_dataset(). create_cat_var() now allows new variable create using decode part codelist label.(#82) create_var_from_codelist() now allows user specify codelist use create new variables. (#83) check_variables() now provides strict option issues warnings rather errors FALSE. (#86) combine_supp() now adds labels “QLABEL” (#71) combine_supp() longer creates “IDVARVAL” column (#78) Improved error reporting create_cat_var, create_var_from_codelist, check_variables. dataset_name argument deprecated various functions. make_lone_dataset function deprecated.

title: metatools 0.1.6
text: CRAN release: 2024-07-23 Breaking change: combine_supp() requires QNAM columns source dataset (#64) Breaking change: build_from_derived() longer requires datasets predecessors, can run single dataset multiple. also now accept unnamed datasets. combine_supp() now allows multiple QNAM values go IDVAR (#63) Allow supp data zero-row combine_supp() (#45) Enhance check_ct_data() na_acceptable can now accept vector variables. Also add new argument omit_vars control variables skipped controlled terminology checks (#57) Add check_unique_keys() check uniqueness records dataset variable keys (#52) Correct description build_from_derived() predecessor_only parameter

title: metatools 0.1.4
text: CRAN release: 2023-02-13 correct bug combine_supp() data supp white space. Now trimmed attempting merge Updates made work newest version dplyr
